title: Speed Converter – Convert km/h, mph, m/s, knots, ft/s

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: m/s is our base. km/h = m/s × 3.6 mph = m/s × 2.236936 ft/s = m/s × 3.28084 knots = m/s × 1.943844 Mach = m/s ÷ 340.29 (approx. speed of sound at 20°C, sea level)
